Package commands

Class Ban

java.lang.Object
commands.util.CommandObject
commands.Ban
public class Ban
extends CommandObject
Description:
Ban represents the ban command that is called if either an admin or the bot itself calls for a ban. The class extends the abstract class CommandObject, and inherits the methods that return the command's unique information. The member to be banned is taken from the arg parameter of the execute() method. The method first checks to make sure index 2 is not empty, and if not, executes the command properly.

Date: August 27, 2021

Since:
1.0.0
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Harrison Hoggard

    • execute

      public void execute​(net.dv8tion.jda.api.entities.Guild guild, net.dv8tion.jda.api.entities.Member member, net.dv8tion.jda.api.entities.TextChannel textChannel, java.lang.String[] arg)
      Description:
      Executes the ban command.
      Specified by:
      execute in class CommandObject
      Parameters:
      guild - the guild that the command was executed from
      member - the member that gave the command request
      textChannel - the text channel that the command was requested in
      arg - the command itself split into separate words. This allows the bot to derive any other arguments made
      Since:
      1.0.0
